website_summaries.verdict: Vanilla latte coffee flavored meal replacement powder has all of the protein you want.
pros: Gives you a high level of caffeine that boosts energy
Contains slow-release proteins, which should help to curb hunger for the entire day
Mix works equally well as a hot, iced, or blended-type of drink
Only 120 calories per serving with 16 grams of protein
cons: Texture seems overly chalky and grainy

customer_reviews.title: Not good straight in coffee
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping I could just add a scoop of this to my coffee in the am as a breakfast substitute. I tried the two scoop serving and it was very think and undrinkable. I then tried just one and it wasn't good either. It binds up and floats to the top. It sounds disgusting but it looks and has the texture of something gross floating on your coffee. Maybe blended with just water in a blender would be better but reviews seemed to think I could do it straight in the coffee which is why I bought it. The taste is actually good, I just cant get past the coagulated goop floating in my java.
customer_reviews.author: BJ ShifTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Horrible dont buy!!!! Less than 1 star !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product states it can be used with hot or cold water or milk. That is incorrect. In hot fluid it separates and is disgusting. I would not buy again. The flavor isnt not appealing and the caffeine advertised is exaggerated. From a true coffee drinker and health conscious person. Bad choice. Also will ad unwanted calories for those wanting a nice cup of coffee and protein in the morning. I wish I could return the rest. What a waist of money. Got me once , wont see another dime from me or others that work in my organization.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Cook

customer_reviews.title: Container is not filled to the top
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 3 star review because when I opened the container so much powder was missing!!! Such a rip off!!!!!!! This picture was taken as soon as I opened the container, I didn’t even use it until the next day! This protein powder tastes great, I’ve been using this now for four days as a breakfast meal replacement as well as eating smaller portions and I’ve lost 3 lbs. I probably won’t be buying this particular powder again since they don’t fill their product up apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa T

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Caramel!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different protein/meal replacement shakes over the last decade, only to find myself midly liking a few of them. I wanted to find an alternative to the Herbalife shakes that really filled me up with using water for the base instead of milk, and I finally have! The purchase price was perfect, below twenty including tax. ***If you don't like coffee, don't buy the caramel*** I haven't tried the vanilla or mocha, but the caramel tastes like the perfect coffee shoppe caramel frappe. I absolutely love it & will probably never switch to another shake brand in my life! (There is no fiber, so plan on supplementing with other options)
customer_reviews.author: Arius

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Drink
customer_reviews.text: I mix this drink with milk and it tastes wonderful! It dissolves easily and makes an excellent meal replacement shake. I look forward to one of these each day, they satisfy the appetite and the satisfaction lasts until next mealtime. I mix this with mocha latte for a really great drink. Would mix really well in a blender: mixes well just stirring with a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is a great addition to my high protein breakfast on the mornings i have time for breakfast and on the mornings I have to run i get my caffeine and meal replacement in no worries. This has been soooo helpful with work, school the gym and keeping up with my 4 year old all at the same time. I will be continuing to purchase through subscription because this will be a staple in my blender cabinet. If i know I've got a real early start I'll shake a serving up the night before and leave it in the fridge for the morning to just grab it and it always tastes just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is light - Like it- top $$ for amount of product
customer_reviews.text: If you mix with vanilla almond milk- you get a vanilla flavor- otherwise flavor is extremely light- Can is 1/2 full when you open it, If you use every day lasts about a week if using according to directions -must use 2 scoops to taste it fully- I DO like it- and the results of missing a meal and added energy- Do not like the cost for the amount of product in can. for me the cost is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder

customer_reviews.title: For someone starting off...
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with my weight and it's been really difficult keeping up with meal plans and dieting. CLICK makes sure that I'm not skipping meals. I have one in the morning and in the afternoon to assist with not having to leave the office for breakfast / lunch and so far they have managed to keep my appetite in check. I will admit that sometimes shaking it up, it looks a little gross but the taste is exceptional. I usually use unsweetened almond milk and it is delicious. It's not expensive -- and if you're just getting back on track with weight loss or even beginning to train, this is a really good product to start with.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mussa

customer_reviews.title: More worth it than Soylent
customer_reviews.text: The first meal replacement powder I ever tried was Soylent, and this beats it for me. It's unfortunate that this tastes like artificial sweetener, but that's to be expected with how little sugar is in this powder. I think my favorite part of this powder aside from price point, though, has to be that it actually satisfies me. For comparison, I could function off of Soylent, but it took a little while after ingesting for my stomach to decide there was enough in it to work with. With this stuff that has yet to be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Ordered the mocha flavor and was a little iffy on buying it at first but the first time I tried it, I was very impressed with the taste and results. I’m still working on portion control so I’m slightly hungry after I drink a blender bottle full but it will suffice until I’m used to it. Mentally, I feel better drinking this instead of eating a meal as it takes away the temptation of unhealthy food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for hot drink
customer_reviews.text: Not all mixes are suitable for hot blend; this one is. No after taste at all, very Impressive. I did not know how much hot water to use; I used about 2 cups per scope of powder. It does taste like Mocha, dilutes very well, no lumps. I was happy with the taste, it was a medium taste between hot chocolate and a bit of coffee, not very sweet but the flavor was there. Because it blends very well and not after taste, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: teeinep

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great With Just Water and Curbs Appetite
customer_reviews.text: This product tastes pretty good with just water, but I'm a chocolate addict so I added some NuNaturals NuStevia Chocolate syrup to it and now its phenominal. Adding milk just adds more calories so I only used water. The protein curbs the hunger until lunch time. The fact that its gluten free keeps me from having stomach cramps. Will definitely buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I literally hate protein drinks because they’re gross tasting. This here is the best protein powder ever! It tastes really good. I bought the caramel. I don’t get any chunks in my blender bottle and I actually finish the entire thing. Also, I do not use this to lose weight. I’m actually trying to gain weight. I drink this in the morning with a small breakfast and also during lunch. Amazing!! I want to try the vanilla latte next. If you’re questioning yourself on this product, just go ahead and buy it! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Besssianna

customer_reviews.title: Great energy, tastes like a frappe.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the vanilla and it is delicious! I mix with skim milk and a few ice cubes in a “Good Life” brand blender bottle. It tastes great, very filling and gives me a burst of energy. I’ve been using it for 4 days and I feel so much better. I’m more alert and productive at work and home. I’m using it to replace 2 meals a day and I eat a light dinner. I’m already losing weight. I just ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Ghostly

customer_reviews.title: Clean up the ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong, I enjoyed the shakes and loved being able to have breakfast and coffee all in one. It was convenient, quick & easy. Blended well and was even better when made with almond milk. Actually tasted like coffee, got my caffeine fix and was very filling for the morning! However, after reading the ingredients, I’m opting to switch to something with a cleaner label. Carrageenan? No thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Coffee and breakfast in one cup
customer_reviews.text: I've only made this with almond milk and it is delicious. I use a shaker cup and it is rich and smooth. I use this as my morning coffee and breakfast in one. I'm on the road early in the morning and cannot survive without coffee. I was worried that this wasn't going to be strong enough to replace my first cup but this holds me until lunch no problem and no caffeine withdrawal. Very happy. I didn't give it 5 stars because I don't feel it's the healthiest shake option available but it does boast some key vitamins and protein so I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Kiseleva

customer_reviews.title: It is alright
customer_reviews.text: It is not a bad protein drink if you want something different. The taste reminds me of the sugar free maxwell house coffee drink mixes. I know with most other proteins... I can use one scoop and the taste is fine. With this, I HAVE to use two or the taste is not good. Overall, this is a great addition to your protein stash. I have only mixed it with fat free milk and almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L.

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: I blend with skim milk in my drink mixer, and it thickens up like a mocha shake. It's a good mid morning snack for me, and keeps me away from the junk. I haven't tried it in water yet. The directions do say if you are going to drink it hot, to mix it up cold before heating. A lot of protein drinks will clump up if mixing in hot fluids.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Caraglio

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to coffee shop fraps!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protein shake; have been drinking them every morning for several months now. I mix it with water and ice - and its just like a frappuccino. I get 20g protein instead of a $5.00 coffee shop tab! I now have this on subscription so I dont run out of it. I did try the mocha, and was not a fan. I prefer the Caramel, which I think still tastes like coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R.

customer_reviews.title: This product is great no chalky or powdery taste
customer_reviews.text: This product is great no chalky or powdery taste, high protein wich make for a great aid when protein intake is important, and the best of all is that it could be made hot or cold, and doesn't have all the lumps when made hot like other protein powders in the market, Ill use this protein powder again to get my coffee bost and my protein so i don,t have to make breakfast
customer_reviews.author: LibrosMania (Booksmania)

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flavor, protein and vitamins a plus
customer_reviews.text: This has great flavor, and the caffeine provides a nice perk. Low calorie drink with (only) a modest protein and vitamin mix. But blended with ice it becomes a delicious coffee house quality drink. This is so good I've ordered it on a subscription basis.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product. I like the caffeine payoff in combination with the protein. Flavor isn't terrible but isn't fantastic either. Definitely drinkable, though. Make sure you shake well and drink quickly though. I'm a slow sipper and after about 20 minutes, the drink and powder start to separate despite near-constant shaking (as seen in the second picture).
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak solely on the results as I'm using another protein powder and eating well, but it mixes good in cool and cold water, I have ordered the vanilla for the second time, it is so good, it's actually my favorite beverage right now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, quick to make and caffeine is a good bonus for a boost to my mornings.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the variety pack since I didn't know which flavor I'd like most. Since usually I would go for vanilla or caramel I was surprised that mocha is my favorite since I'm not a big chocolate lover. In my order I only received 8 packets instead of 10 like described in the product details. I contacted the seller and they promptly shipped out the missing packets. I do like drinking these on work days because they're quick to make in the mornings, keep me full until lunch and the caffeine gives me a good boost to get through the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kori S.

customer_reviews.title: Really good protein drink
customer_reviews.text: Really good protein drink! I wasn't sure what to expect since this was my first order. I didn't find it to be sweet at all, which was good, but I added a little bit of flavored coffee creamer and it was perfect. While I like that it wasn't full of sugar it tasted a little bitter on its own so that's why I only gave it four stars. With the little bit of creamer it's perfect! I like it in the blender with some ice. I've used water and skim milk and liked it both ways. I'd like to add, too, that it doesn't taste like a protein drink and I've had plenty of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Taste
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised! I ordered the caramel and it tastes great! I just got it yesterday, so I can't attest to any long term benefits but my appetite was curbed all day. I felt good, with a moderate amount of steady energy. After being burned a few times with drink mixes, whether by taste or performance I'm glad I found one that I am happy with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: life changing
customer_reviews.text: this protein powder is amazing! I use it as my breakfast meal replacement and it takes no effort, no time at all. I follow the recommend directions and use it in a shaker bottle. i’ve only ever tried it over ice or cold so i’m not sure how well the “hot” kind is. water works well with it but I found any form of milk helps me stay full longer. I will definitely be buying more and in a bigger size, as this will be my breakfast forever!
customer_reviews.author: Kamrie

customer_reviews.title: Real Coffee plus protein yesssss!
customer_reviews.text: This product gives me added protein with a delicious coffee taste. Carmel is awesome. Just need one scoop as 2 can come off as sweet but I like flavored coffee. It is so easily blended you do not need a blender. When you shake for a bit the grit is virtually non existent. It gives me a boost better than hot coffee. It curbs snacking. Do not drink hot!!! Recommends to drink hot or cold but drinking hot is awful. Otherwise will order again.
customer_reviews.author: carmona

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the taste with water at all
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the taste with water at all. The coffee taste can be very strong so I turned the taste down with vanilla almond milk and used one scoop and 1/2 of powder with ice. it was yummy. This powder blends very well with just a Blender bottle. Very good protein mix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product came highly recommended but left me wanting. The energy boost from it was minimal, and the coffee taste was overly processed and fake. The powder would NEVER full mix. Tried stirring, moved up to shaker bottle, and finally blender. No matter what I still found large bits that just didn't absorb any water. The thickness of it was slightly thicker than water, but by no means milk level thick. Went down easily enough when you chug it, but had no perks outside of being a stale coffee flavored water. Would recommend against unless that taste of coffee is your style. (No judgement here, to each their own!)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Busey

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a mean replacement shake that works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried and tried to find a meal replacement shake for breakfast that will fill me up and not make me fell hungry in a hour with no luck. Then I came across click here on amazon, read the reviews and gave it a shot. Today I’m ordering my second container or click (the Carmel flavor) because I’m hooked. I wake up a early times for work, so I’ll just grab a shaker, fill it with 12 ounces of water, 2 scoops of click, and walk out the door. Best part is the taste. Has great taste, blends well with NO clumping, and actually fills me up till lunch, which for me is 7 hours later
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly

customer_reviews.title: taste is just okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love caramel and I love coffee. It had great reviews saying how delicious it is but I just find the taste to be okay. Its not gross, but nothing special. I mixed it with unsweetened almond milk. I think it would probably be better with sweetened almond milk but trying to avoid the extra sugar and calories.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great caffinated meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great meal replacement and couldn't have asked for any other flavor. I drink it every morning sinceI am not a big breakfast person. It's caffinated, and I don't feel hungry at all. As a coffee lover and breakfast skipper, I approve of it!
customer_reviews.author: Deeply

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and limits the amount I eat
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein mix. It tastes great. I drink it every morning. It doesn't work as a meal replacement for me, but it definitely cuts down on how much I eat. I have been drinking this for about 2 weeks now. I do not snack in the morning and I don't need my 2-3 cups of coffee. I also eat about half the amount I use to eat for breakfast. Do not hesitate on buying this, it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: annegalina

customer_reviews.title: Sea Salt Caramel Latte
customer_reviews.text: This product has really grown on me. It's nice to have a morning cup of Joe that packs in my protein and caffeine in a warm and creamy beverage instead of me always having a frozen protein smoothie or shake. I like the caramel flavor with a little sea salt sprinkled in. It doesn't taste like Starbucks but it is nice for a change. Oh, and it packs 200 mg of caffeine!
customer_reviews.author: c borne

customer_reviews.title: Love it cold or hot!
customer_reviews.text: I got the mocha mix and I love it. It's the perfect sweetness and the coffee flavor really comes through. I love it cold but on cold mornings I love to drink it hot. It doesn't mix well at all in hot liquid in so I mix it in cold water and microwave it for a couple minutes and sometimes add a small amount of milk or half/half to add some creaminess.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I get a serving of fruits and veggies and it tastes just like a frozen coffee drink
customer_reviews.text: This is now my go to coffee drink in the morning. I haven't used my coffee pot since I started drinking this. I make one coffee smoothie for breakfast, this plus the original organic greens, ice and water. Blend it up and drink it. I get a serving of fruits and veggies and it tastes just like a frozen coffee drink. I've tried all the flavors and I like the Carmel the best, it's the sweetest and I have a bit of a sweet tooth. The mocha is thicker than the others but not so much that it puts me off. The vanilla isn't bad, it's just not my cup of tea. :)
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste like coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shake for two purposes. 1. To help me get healthy and into shape. 2. To replace my coffee that I normally dump a ton of sugar in. I am dependant on coffee, I get headaches with no caffeine, I hoped to use this to help wean wean me off of it. It does work as a coffee replacement but.... It doesn't taste like coffee. I couldn't drink it with water but it was decent with milk, still tasted more like a shake than coffee. Going to finish the tub and probably won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor - a bit sweeter than I am used to
customer_reviews.text: I just received caramel and vanilla flavors and have to say kudos on the flavor and smoothness. One serving mixed with water and no additional ingredients satisfies me for about 2-3 hours. I personally would be happier if the sweetener was either stevia or none at all, However, I can see it working well with greens thrown in the blender.
customer_reviews.author: zoombamom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't enjoy the taste at all!
customer_reviews.text: I saw so many rave reviews, I was convinced it would be great, I was hoping to have something easy to grab in the morning as a replacement for breakfast and a coffee. It mixed up in a blender bottle easily but tastes so bad, I can't finish it. I got the vanilla latte and it tastes like a strong mocha artificial flavoring, I have tried other brands before, this is by far the worst tasting one I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: tngaynor

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awesome and is super smooth
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this from some of the reviews. But as soon as I had this for lunch I was blown away by how smooth and how awesome this tastes. It has a strong coffee flavor and is super filling. I am very impressed and have already ordered some more.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett & Faith Ribble

customer_reviews.title: Protein for coffee lovers
customer_reviews.text: This protein taste great! There is no chalk taste or grainy residue. I mixed the protein with milk instead of water and added ice. I used my blender and done! Taste just like a frappuccino and so quick to make. Definetly reccomend this protein for coffee lovers. Ive replaced my morning coffee with this and i get my caffeine fix as well as feeling full.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, haven’t had a cup of coffee in a month or so, cause I use this as a substitute. It helps my energy level. It’s tastes pretty good, I did have to get used to the taste, it doesn’t taste just like coffee, specially because I put cream in sugar in my coffee. I love this stuff though, I did the subscription, I wish it would go out sooner than a month, cause the size I get does not last a whole month.
customer_reviews.author: alona mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well with water in a shaker bottle, but is best blended with almond milk and ice. I mixed it with hot water and it didn’t mix super well had a layer on top even after mixing a lot. But was still drinkable. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick snack before the gym
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is not a crazy amount of calories and I can drink it about an hour before going to the gym. I would highly recommend using a blender bottle. I usually mix it with almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: THall

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! This powder is a life changer. Not only does it mix well and doesn't have that protein after taste....this product is so freaking delicious and great for replacing sugar when you get those cravings!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a new protein powder and thought with coffe flavor it would be great. It is so disgusting. I've tried mixing it with water, milk and almond milk and it is still bad. Plus leaves a gross after taste in your mouth. Can't return it because I opened it or I would.
customer_reviews.author: BA Williams

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla Coffee Protein
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff!!!!! I have only tried the Vanilla so far but it is amazing I put two scoops in with 2 cups of unsweetened almond milk throw it in my blender and pour over Ice and it is by far the best protein powered I have ever tried I use it as my breakfast meal replacement and coffee replacement and I stay full til lunch so I don't even feel like I'm on one of those Liquid meal replacement diets I definitely Recommend this if you love coffee and need a meal replacement or supplement
customer_reviews.author: Kelci

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: So I haven't tried this product hot. I don't feel like it would be good. But mixing it in a blender with coconut milk & ice is really good. It's not like froofroo coffee flavor. Has a bitterness like real coffee. Like strong coffee with a little bit of cream & sugar. I was skeptical after so many bad reviews about flavor but if you like stronger coffee with more coffee flavor you'll like this
customer_reviews.author: Black Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Dunkin’ who?? Jk #dunksforlife
customer_reviews.text: Okay, when i tell you that I’ve tried SO many protein shakes, meal replacement shakes, etc. you name it I've tried it and this stuff right here?! It is the perfect way to keep me from going to Dunks every morning. I have this pretty much every day and i am awake and READY. Im shocked i dont miss my French Vanilla/ Caramel swirl with a turbo shot. Thats a big deal for me. If you’re wondering if this is anything like the others you've tried, i an here to tell you its not. TRY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon anonymous (AA)

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I actually love coffee and this protein was great. What I normally do is add half water and half warm coffee to make it more room temp to drink. The flavor is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and Provides A Good Zing in the Morning
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th container! Tastes really good and provides the energy needed to get through the morning hump. Have tried 2 flavors - Latte and Mocha - that are both palatable. It is priced a bit above standard protein drinks, but if it works and tastes good then, I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: Tae C.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't like protein shakes, but this tastes just like a Starbucks caramel frap. I've tried it mixed with milk, and blended with milk & ice. It's surprisingly good and I don't have to feel guilty about drinking one every morning since it's much lower in calories than an actual Starbucks drink. I'll definitely repurchase when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT shake with hot water LOL
customer_reviews.text: The stuff tastes really good and isn't super clumpy even when shaken without one of those special containers with the little shaker ball inside, but if you want to have it hot, shake it first with cold water and then heat up the mixture. Do not heat the water first and then add the shake mix because when you shake it it will explode all over your carpet at work :P The direction do say to shake it first, but I didn't listen. Learn from my mistake. I really like it though.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Protein Shake with the bang of espresso
customer_reviews.text: Taste great and satisfy hunger awesome way to start the morning. Just like having a Starbucks ice coffee with the benefits of protein added. The espresso is perfect amount to wake you out without causing jitters or headaches. Will definitely be adding this to my mornings on the daily now. Signed up to receive monthly shipments to ensure I don’t run out don’t want to miss a morning without this awesome protein shake/delicious coffee
customer_reviews.author: Erin Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about warmth lol, but I like the taste and I feel full after drinking one serving size. Has really helped in weight loss and when busy with the babies.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Probst

customer_reviews.title: Carmel is my go-to flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Only dropped a star because I wish it blended better in a shaker bottle. It recommends 2 scoops but I typically take one or 1-1/2 depending on how tired I am in the morning! Other than that it’s been great! Great flavor and it’s great hot or cold. I don’t recommend mixing it in anything besides water just based on personal experience!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiJP17

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein drink and have ordered several containers and it for sure is my morning go to. I only add cold water to it and it taste great. I don't find it gritty tasting, in fact I love the way it taste. I get the vanilla flavor and will be a customer for as long as they continue to sell it.
customer_reviews.author: C&C

customer_reviews.title: Great for breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protein drink because I am getting my coffee and breakfast in one! I have replaced it with my morning coffee and it does not make me feel like I skipped my morning caffeine. It also keeps me full for a few hours until lunch time and I feel great after drinking it. All flavors are decent but the vanilla is my favorite. I use my ninja bullet to blend it up and then put some ice in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE drinking this in the morning when I don’t have time to get breakfast. I love that I can mix it with water in my blender bottle and don’t need an actual blender to get it to dissolve.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Too gritty
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of a latte that is good for you, and really wanted to like this. I tried everything I could think of to make sure I was mixing this the best I could. I bought a mixer ball container, cold water, hot water, hotter water. Small lumps that did not dissolve made it hard to drink. Finally tried my Ninja Blender that makes snow, without water and with water. No lumps but still gritty while drinking and the empty cup was coated. Will not buy again, and the rest of this product is in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K.

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking at all types of protein shakes avoid this one
customer_reviews.text: It mixes so-so. Lots of clumping no matter how long you shake it using hand shaker. I even went as far as to try and use a whisk to get it to mix better. Now lets move on to the taste. I had to force myself to drink it down. The taste is terrible. Maine roasters or Chike taste a million times better. If you're into self abuse then buy this. I threw the rest away.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a protein shake this is my 1st time trying any type of shake I needed some energy and I just started working out so I thought I would give this product a try since it had a high rating. I got the vanilla Latte it was really good I used Rice milk Instead of water. There were no clumps it blended very well.
customer_reviews.author: Skeletor

customer_reviews.title: A good idea in theory, in taste not so much
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this because I thought having caffeine it would give me a bit of a boost that I was lacking from my regular morning breakfast shakes however it is just too artificially sweet for my tastes. I even tried cutting it with half this and half of my usual vegan vanilla shake and it still doesn’t mask the taste of fake sugar. Maybe it is better hot like regular coffee but that isn’t what I purchased this mix for.
customer_reviews.author: anniemac5

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking it twice a day for the last two days. A few things I noticed right away I have more energy , I'm not as hungry and my stomach that everything bothers it feels fine... So I'm really happy and will be ordering more!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris t.

customer_reviews.title: So...I am SHOOK
customer_reviews.text: This...is SO GOOD! How is it so good?! It blends so well and tastes exactly like a vanilla latte. And the caffeine is definitely hitting right now, which I definitely needed. My go-to powder is Quest (I haven't tried their coffee flavor, though), but I'm definitely getting more of this!
customer_reviews.author: Myisha

customer_reviews.title: I have been searching for a great tasting protein shake and this one fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a great tasting protein shake and this one fits the bill. Love the coffee kick. I was mixing instant coffee into another type of chocolate shake mix and this is so much easier and tastes much better. I mix 2 scoops with one cup of Almond milk and six ice cubes in my bottle blender and I am out the door with a great breakfast. I have the Mocha and I have tried the caramel. Both are good but I prefer the mocha. I have not tried it as a hot drink but the directions say it can be made that way. I would recommend this product an plan on purchasing again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Brunkhorst

customer_reviews.title: Great meal to go
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Blends pretty well in a shaker bottle when water is put in first. Not gritty or bland. Rich chocolate flavor. Love that I can have hot or cold. Keeps me pretty full with a side of fruit.
customer_reviews.author: A. lewis

customer_reviews.title: This is seriously so good. Aside from the fact that it gives me ...
customer_reviews.text: I normally drag my feet writing reviews due to my own forgetfulness but every time I drink this product it reminds me that I had to provide feedback. This is seriously so good. Aside from the fact that it gives me my mid-afternoon energy boost, it is so delicious and I don't feel guilty drinking it. I use Click as my afternoon lunch/meal replacement and have been extremely satisfied. It keeps me from feeling hungry and it tastes so good. I will definitely be trying more flavors once I finish up the caramel but would highly recommend trying Click!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Slim Fast Advanced Energy!
customer_reviews.text: I used to drink Slim Fast Advanced Energy coffee flavored breakfast drink and when they discontinued it I was extremely disappointed. I tried a few different caffeinated breakfast shake mixes and all were disappointing in taste and energy boost. I ordered this product last week and although it’s more expensive it well exceeds my expectations. The taste is even better than Slim Fast; and the caffeine is high enough that it gets me ready for the day!
customer_reviews.author: FastLane494

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Click
customer_reviews.text: Been a click customer for many, many, many years and will continue to be. It makes the perfect home made frappe's. Thanks drinkclick dot com I love Click! Wish more people knew about click!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hoping that it wont have a chalky flavor like all the other protein shakes do. Unfortunately it does. Maybe I am just too picky, but I was hoping for a better flavor. I got a variety pack to try. Didn't like Mocha at all, caramel was a little better, but still not great.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Click mocha protein coffee drink
customer_reviews.text: I love the click protein mocha drink, great price, the mocha taste fantastic. Lost weight using it as a meal replacement. Finally getting it on auto delivery !!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. Enjoy ice cold.
customer_reviews.text: It is insane how delicious this is. Every morning for breakfast and a mid-afternoon snack to replace my energy drink binges. Three scoops of this, a handful of ice, and 12oz of water make for an iced coffee drink that is easy to add to another routine. I wanted to knock off a star because Amazon doesn't have this available by the ton.
customer_reviews.author: Ocelot

customer_reviews.title: The best tasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein shake I have ever had and I have tried a lot. All I do is shake it with a scoop with water, the taste is really good. The price is expensive because the container is not full its about halfway full, so if you drink this everyday for breakfast it can become costly.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy76

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: So good! I am not one who really likes the taste of protein drinks and this just taste like coffee to me it is really tasty. I mix it just with water and ice and it does not take away from the flavor at all. When I mix it with almond milk the consistency is a little too thick for me but the flavor is still good! Not gritty at all but I use a portable blender bottle to mix it. Only gave it 4 stars because like some said the container only comes a little more than halfway full with product.
customer_reviews.author: Stassi

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: day four, so far so good! Taste great! I have tried it hot and cold and definitely prefer it cold. It has definitely helped to keep me energized all the way until lunch. Also feel less bloated waking up in the morning. As a reference, I have been having the drink for breakfast, eating lunch at 1pm and then something lite for dinner. So I have ended up fasting anywhere from 5/8pm all the way until 1pm and have had great results.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Hester

customer_reviews.title: Full of hidden sugars
customer_reviews.text: Full of carbs and hidden sugars No thanks , waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: TerriLynn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Yummy! Highly recommend this flavor of Click. Seems like it is very popular and I couldn't even get it from the Click website. I finally decided to check Amazon. Voila! I am very happy that I now have it. Great and tasty way to get your protein. I drink it hot, delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend used to drink mountain dew every day for the caffeine. All that sugar is so bad for you, so he eventually switched over to this. He loves it! It has plenty of caffeine to keep him awake, but it also fills his appetite until the afternoon. I tried this also and it has a great flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Yum!  Best protein, my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, not my first order of it. Great to drink for breakfast, tides me over till mid-morning or even lunch time. Update: 2/26/19. I can’t live without this protein. It is my all time favorite! Enjoyable flavor! Mix in a shaker so that you get all the clumps that other reviews speak of, mixed up and in. I use unsweetened almond milk in mine and it’s amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: sonjarenee2001

customer_reviews.title: Soooo good!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite meal replacement(I use it to replace 1 meal/day)!!! I ‘blended’ it with cold almond milk(30 calories unsweetened) and viola! Soooo good! Its like melted coffee chocolate ice cream! I got tired of Fit by Raw(which i enjoyed for a very long time, and still enjoys) I just needed an option, turns out, this might replace it! Must try!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 loves online shopping!

customer_reviews.title: CLICK IS DELIGHTFUL
customer_reviews.text: I AM A REAL COFFEE LOVER, I LOVE THIS PRODUCT IT IS EXCELLENT. THE COFFEE IS WONDERFUL AND FULL OF FLAVOR IT IS SMOOTH AS A SHAKE . IT TASTE LIKE A HIGH END FRAPPA. PLUS GREAT AS A CUP OF COFFEE IN THE MORNING. YUMMMY YUMMY YUMMY PROTEIN AND COFFEE. GREATEST MEAL REPLACEMENT EVER!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PASCHY POOH

customer_reviews.title: Really good! It gives me a boost and It has ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good! It gives me a boost and It has a lot of caffeine 150mg! Good for me! Delicious taste!
customer_reviews.author: CrissyG

customer_reviews.title: Does not work to suppress appetite or give energy
customer_reviews.text: Does not work very good. The drink does not mix well when warmed up. I do not feel full after drinking it and have noticed it does not curb my appetite at all. Does not give me extra energy either. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was not what I expected. It had a chemical type taste in both warm and cold drinks. When going to the bathroom the chemical smell from this product was quite strong. I gave it 3 stars because Amazon customer service was kind enough to refund the purchase. I sure had high hopes for this product with all the good reviews it had
customer_reviews.author: vanity

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING ♥️
customer_reviews.text: When I get up at 4am for work I take it, holds me over until lunch, I also took it at lunch and was ready for dinner at 8 pm. But as a aircraft fueler I was doing heavy work
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps you to lose weight. I substitute this for my lunch and it keeps me full till dinner. The flavor is good, I also like to add chia seeds to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Lampert

customer_reviews.title: I love it and everyone I've recommended it to has loved it too.
customer_reviews.text: I cant even begin to tell you how much I love this drink. I use it as a meal replacement for breakfast and lunch. I am not hungry between meals and I don't feel ravenous at dinner time. The caffeine isn't overwhelming but it is enough that I'm not having caffeine headaches either. It tastes amazing!!! I have told everyone I know about it and several people have ordered it and loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mix up as well as I'd hoped. Tried it in coffee but that was a mistake because I was in caffeine overload. I tried it in hot water. It was good but if I didn't stir it before each drink, there'd be a thick "skin" on the top of the water. It reminded me of pudding.

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Really Works - Mocha
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered by second order of the Mocha Click........works incredibly well as an appetite and sweet urge suppressant . I found that the only way to properly get this blended was to use a power blender like a Magic Bullet.....all other ways didn't get the job done. I make a medium size cup of black coffee, pour it into my Bullet, add two scoops of the Click Mocha, blend it for 15 seconds and then pour it into a cup. The foam on top is very thick and can be eaten with a spoon then you drink the coffee underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbbn

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff I been trying stop drinking coffee and i have been drinking the click and i have not had any with draw side effects from stopping the coffee This is very good I will continue to buy this and I have not had any regular coffee in a week.
customer_reviews.author: it keeps sighting me out

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions to try it for the first time - it was incredibly disgusting. I saw some reviews where people mixed it into their coffee and they seem to like it. I haven’t tried that yet and probably won’t. Gross product! It tastes like funky extremely weak watery coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a meal replacement, I am a nurse and work long night shifts. This powder serves a dual purpose. I love both the mocha and vanilla flavor. It can be a little difficult to mix without lumps, but other than that it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Blended with ice is way better thwn anything you can get at a coffee shop and a lot better for you. Cant say it does much for a supplement but not feeling bad when i drink it is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfBoys

customer_reviews.title: Good way to manage calories
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking this this for breakfast. The taste is not bad. I prefer mocha over the caramel but both are good. Gives a good boost of caffeine, although it does not keep me full and I still have to snack once before lunch. Still, it is a good way to manage calories.
customer_reviews.author: Melsmith

customer_reviews.title: Delicious 😋
customer_reviews.text: One word: Delicious! No funny aftertaste; no leftover froth; the right amount of sweetness, not too sweet, not too bland. I’ve only used water, and that has been great. I followed someone else’s comment advice and got the vanilla flavored one. Will be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stuff! Wish they had bigger cartons than the 15.3 ounce, I go through it so fast. Two scoops is one serving, and I just mix it with cold water, sometimes adding ice once a day after working out. I'm a huge vanilla late fan, and while it's not exactly the flavor it's still amazing nonetheless. I've always been scared to try protein powders like this but have zero regrets, been drinking this for two months now.
customer_reviews.author: K. Avello

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor. Mixed with milk it’s a great breakfast drink, caffeine supplement, and hunger reducer. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled Customer

customer_reviews.title: No icky after taste!
customer_reviews.text: Delish! Made me feel full and like I had something sweet! Had one for breakfast and one for dinner with a healthy lunch. Loved it! Best with ice and cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

product_meta.title: CLICK All-in-One Protein & Coffee Meal Replacement Drink Mix, Vanilla Latte, 15.3 Ounce
product_meta.description: Flavor:Vanilla Latte| Size:15.3 Ounce (Pack of 1)Finally, a delicious, easy-to-make, high protein coffee drink mix designed to help you achieve your personal weight-loss and health goals. CLICK Espresso Protein Drink known as the coffee lover’s protein drink is can be enjoyed hot, cold or blended. Made with real gourmet espresso coffee, CLICK provides the decadent flavor you love, with the nutrition you need, to boost your energy, curb your appetite and improve fat burning. With 15 g. of protein, double-shot gourmet espresso coffee, 23 vitamins/minerals and Gluten free. CLICK is an everyday, healthy lifestyle drink, ideal as an all-in-one morning meal replacement, appetite-curbing afternoon snack or as a nutrition drink to support your workout. While CLICK tastes like a decadent treat, you can enjoy CLICK guilt-free knowing you are doing something good for yourself one cup at a time!
feature_bullets: MEAL REPLACEMENT: CLICK Coffee Protein is an all-in-one, low calorie, coffee protein powder drink mix to curb appetite, keep energized and promote fat burning. Perfect as breakfast meal replacement, mid-day pick-me-up, snack or pre- or post-workout drink.

BOOST ENERGY, CURB APPETITE: CLICK is a low calorie coffee protein meal replacement drink designed to boost energy, curb appetite & promote fat burning. With coffee-house drink flavors like vanilla latte, mocha, & caramel, enjoy CLICK hot, iced or blended.

REAL COFFEE: CLICK has 150 mg of caffeine from double-shot of espresso coffee, not coffee flavor or synthetic stimulants, along with CLICK’s slow-releasing proteins to help suppress appetite while giving you the energy you need to get through your day.

ORIGINAL BEST-SELLER: CLICK and CLICK Active are the original, best-selling, all-in-one coffee protein drink mix! Boost your energy, metabolism & protein intake to help achieve your weight loss or workout goals by drinking what you already love - coffee!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
